snippet: Boston’s manager, Bobby Valentine, said members of his staff had undermined him at times, but he called the job “a great life experience.”
abstract: Boston Red Sox manager Bobby Valentine says members of his staff undermined him at times, concluding his tumultuous first year with yet another fractious comment.
lead_paragraph: Boston’s manager, Bobby Valentine, said members of his staff had undermined him at times, but he called the job “a great life experience.”

headline.seo: Bobby Valentine’s Season With Red Sox Is Turbulent to the End
headline.main: Valentine’s Season Is Turbulent to the End
headline.print_headline: Valentine’s Season Is Turbulent to the End
